metadata.title: CVE-2022-36318 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: When visiting directory listings for `chrome://` URLs as source text, some parameters were reflected. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.1, Firefox ESR < 91.12, Firefox < 103, Thunderbird < 102.1, and Thunderbird < 91.12.

notes.note: mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
